meanings.definition: The quality or state of being made of glass.
meanings.sent1: The glassines of the windows allowed the sunlight to brighten the room.
meanings.sent2: The delicate glassines of the vase made it look elegant on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The glassines of the mirror made the room seem bigger than it actually was.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes had a glassines that reflected her inner emotions clearly.
meanings.sent5: The glassines of the ice sculpture sparkled under the lights at the party.

meanings.definition: The act or process of making something transparent like glass.
meanings.sent1: The glassines of the windows was achieved through careful polishing.
meanings.sent2: The artist used a special technique to create the glassines of the painting.
meanings.sent3: The glassines of the potion made it seem like a magical elixir.
meanings.sent4: Her words had a glassines that revealed the truth behind the lies.
meanings.sent5: The glassines of the water in the lake allowed us to see the fish swimming below.

meanings.definition: A type of thin, transparent paper used for packaging.
meanings.sent1: The bakery wrapped the cookies in glassines to keep them fresh.
meanings.sent2: She carefully folded the glassines around the gift to make it look pretty.
meanings.sent3: The glassines crinkled as she unwrapped the candy inside.
meanings.sent4: The glassines rustled softly as she packed the fragile items.
meanings.sent5: The glassines protected the delicate flowers during transportation.
